title: Why does Alt + Tab in Fullscreen take ages now?
body: This just started in the latest update\patch, or the one before it. It now takes 5+ seconds to alt tab in and out of the game, whereas before it was almost instant. What is the deal here? Anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: That mostly depends on how quickly your pc can actively switch between tasks. I'd try looking for any driver updates you might have missed, but also take a look through the other steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) while you're at it!
